titles.title: To establish a moratorium on approval by the Secretary of the Interior of relinquishment of a lease of certain tribal lands in California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: 9/9/2002--Introduced. Prohibits the Secretary of the Interior, prior to January 1, 2005, from approving the relinquishment of any lease entered into for the establishment of a health care facility for the members of seven Indian tribes or bands in San Diego County, California, unless such lease's relinquishment has been approved by tribal resolution by each of the tribes or bands.
